source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Angry Purple Snugglefin Murloc Hood

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 117,913 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,731 to 9,450 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 286 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,437 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 128,227 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
